mapper.select: SELECT document_no,document_title,draft_date FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( ( SELECT d.document_title,d.document_no, draft_date, a.employee_id,ap_type FROM approval a JOIN document d ON a.document_no=d.document_no WHERE a.employee_id=#{id} AND ap_type='대기' ) UNION ALL ( SELECT d.document_title,d.document_no, draft_date, ag.employee_id,ap_type FROM agreement ag JOIN document d ON ag.document_no=d.document_no WHERE ag.employee_id=#{id} AND ap_type='대기' ) ORDER BY draft_date asc ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT bd_no, bd_title,employee_id "writer.employee_id",bd_date FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, b.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY bd_date desc) b ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT skd_start_date ,skd_title FROM ( SELECT skd_start_date ,skd_title, row_number() OVER ( PARTITION BY e.employee_id ORDER BY skd_start_date ASC ) rn FROM schedule s JOIN employee e ON s.employee_id=e.employee_id JOIN department d ON e.department_id=d.department_id WHERE ((d.department_id=#{department.departmentId} AND s.skd_share='t') OR (s.employee_id=#{employeeId} AND s.skd_share='p')) AND to_char(skd_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 5
